text: Rojako (vratako) ratrima timila'i aphno svasnisita sahavasako anumati di'i'eko cha. Tiniharu timra vastra hun ra timiharu unaka vastra hau. Allahala'i tyasa kurako janakari cha juna ki timiharule gopya rupale gardathyau. (Tasartha) usale timimathi krpa gari timro ksamayacana svikara gari timro kriyakalapaharula'i ksama garidiyo aba timila'i sahavasagarne ra allahale je nirdharita gareko cha tyasa cijako khoji garne ijajata cha. Timile tabasam'ma khana pina gara jabasam'ma ki pratahko seto dharko (ratiko) kalo dharkobata spasta bha'i naja'os. (Pheri vratabasi) samjhasam'ma roja pura gara ra jaba timi masjidaharuma etikapha (ekantama upasana) ko lagi baseka hunchau, taba aphno strisita sahavasa nagara. Yi allahabata nirdharita gari'eka sima hun, tiniharu che'u pani najanu. Yastai kisimale allaha aphna slokaharu manisaharula'i spastarupama varnana gardacha, taki tiniharu atmasanyami banun
